pr_title: Load duties sooner after node finishes syncing

timeline.message:
Split out a separate class to handle retrying logic for loading duties.
Continue retrying while the node is syncing.
Stop retrying to load duties once the epoch has passed.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into retry-if-syncing

timeline.body:
Any reason you can't do:
```suggestion
    return requestDuties(epoch, duties);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Any reason you can't do:

Suggested change
requestDuties(epoch, duties).propagateTo(duties);
return requestDuties(epoch, duties);
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: Because we want to be able to see when the returned future is cancelled and stop retrying. If we return the one requestDuties provides requestDuties wouldn't have access to it itself to see if it's been cancelled.
